metadata.creator: Nintendo of America
metadata.description:
Tracks 1-5 from Killer Instinct Gold composed by Robin Beanland
Track 6 from Wave Race 64* composed by Kazumi Totaka
Tracks 7-8 from Star Fox 64**
Tracks 9-17 from Blast Corps composed by Graeme Norgate
Tracks 18-31 from Super Mario 64 composed by Koji Kondo

There are many inconsistencies between the back tracklist and the actual disc contents:
Track 4 "Glacius" is really the game's character selection music
Track 5 "Jago" is a collection of sound effects
*Track 6 "Wave Race" does not appear in the game
**Tracks 7 and 8 are arranged tracks from SNES Star Fox (TECD-25275) composed by Hajime Hirasawa and arranged by Kisho Yamanaka
Track 32 "Credits Roll" is listed on the back, but does not appear on the disc
metadata.subject: Soundtrack Sampler
metadata.title: Nintendo 64 Original Soundtrack Greatest Hits
